quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Director and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, country, comedienne/actress/writer. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: He began as a top notch still photographer, specializing in  black and white  photojournalism. He is best known for his photo essays for Life magazine and for his 1971 film Shaft.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gordon Parks

questions.question: Name the director of the successful Pirates of the Caribbean movies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gore Verbinski

questions.question: What accident caused partial paralysis of Sylvester Stallones face, resulting in his famous pronunciation and lip droop?

options.text: He was kicked in the face while practicing martial arts.
He was accidentally shot in the face while shooting a movie scene.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a accident at his birth

questions.question: She was often called The female Ed Wood.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doris Wishman

questions.question: This director/writer/producer/actress was married to writer Dan Greenburgand and journalist Carl Bernstein. In 1987 she married her third husband, Nicholas Pileggi.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nora Ephron

questions.question: Who is the Mexican-born director of the Golden Globe-winning movie Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

questions.question: This comedienne/actress/writer was an up and coming director until she made the great flop Ishtar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elaine May

questions.question: After directing many music videos, this director made the wonderful movie Being John Malkovich and  2002s Adaptation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spike Jonze

questions.question: Who is the director of the award-winning films Antonias Line, The Luzhin Defense, and Mrs. Dalloway?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marleen Gorris

questions.question: She directed Desperately Seeking Susan as well as  some episodes of Sex and The City and Now and Again. Her mother wrote The Boynton Beach Bereavement Club.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Susan Seidelman

questions.question: Who is the New Zealand-born director of the Academy Award-nominated movie North Country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nikki Caro

questions.question: Clint Eastwood considered this director his teacher and  dedicated his movie Unforgiven to him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Don Siegel

questions.question: This director, who has played drums for Kanye West, directed The  Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, Human Nature and Be Kind Rewind.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Gondry

questions.question: What sport had Arnold Schwarzenegger practiced before he took up bodybuilding?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Soccer

questions.question: This directors movies usually have Gothic elements in them. He directed Ed Wood, Edward Scissorhands, Pee-Wees Big Adventure, and Beetlejuice.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tim Burton

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bruce Willis and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What hobby did Academy Award-winning actor Sean Connery have when he was younger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bodybuilding

questions.question: What celebrated action movie made actor Bruce Willis world famous?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Die Hard

questions.question: Which of the following was action star Bruce Lee able to do?

options.text: Do push-ups supporting himself on the thumb and index finger of one hand
Throw rice into the air and catch the grains in midair with chopsticks
Thrust his fingers through an unopened soft drink can made from thick steel

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What musical instrument did action star Steven Seagal learn to play, and later used as an accompaniment to his vocal performances?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Guitar

questions.question: What character did Bruce Willis voice in the 2003 animated movie Rugrats Go Wild?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spike

questions.question: For his performance in what action movie did Denzel Washington win his first Academy Award for Best Actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Training Day

questions.question: What musical instrument did Bruce Willis learn to play when he was younger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harmonica

questions.question: What popular American martial artist did Jean-Claude Van Damme portray in the 1988 movie Bloodsport?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Dux

questions.question: When he was a baby, action star Jackie Chan was nicknamed Pao Pao. What does this literally mean in Chinese?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cannonball

questions.question: Which of these movie characters based on real people was not portrayed by Robert De Niro?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Don Michael Corleone

questions.question: Bruce Willis claimed this actor helped him get over his divorce with Demi Moore in 2000.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Will Smith

questions.question: For his performance in what movie did Bruce Willis receive his first Golden Globe nomination?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In Country

questions.question: What happens to Bruce Willis character, Harry Stamper, in the 1998 movie Armageddon?

options.text: He returns to Earth and dies in an accident.
He returns to Earth and lives a long and happy life.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dies in space.

questions.question: What is the name of Bruce Willis debut music album released in 1987?

options.text: If It Dont Kill You, It Just Makes You Stronger
Classic Bruce Willis: The Universal Masters Collection

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Return of Bruno

questions.question: In which of these movies has Bruce Willis made cameo appearances as himself?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, myers, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Stephen Chow Sing-chi plays in these movies, and is also the director and writer of all of them, but one.

questions.question: How many make up artists worked on the film Planet of the Apes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: more than 80

questions.question: What kind of eyes does Dr. Loomis say Michael had in the 1978 Halloween movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Devils eyes

questions.question: Jackie Chan appears in all these movies but one. Which is the odd one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iron Monkey

questions.question: What animal character did Bruce Willis voice in the 2006 animated movie Over the Hedge?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: RJ the Raccoon

questions.question: Which female actress partners with Jet Li in the movie Kiss of the Dragon, directed by Chris Nahon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bridget Fonda

questions.question: The following words were spoken by Leo, referring to Jin, in which movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: House of Flying Daggers

questions.question: What is Jet Lis characters name in the movie Hero, directed by Zhang Yimou?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nameless

questions.question: As a child Michael Myers, the character from the Halloween film series, was relatively normal until what age?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6

questions.question: What was the name of Bruce Willis character in the 1994 movie Pulp Fiction?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Butch Coolidge

questions.question: What does Laurie stab Michael with in the fight scene at the Doyle house in the first Halloween movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: knitting needle

questions.question: What character did Bruce Willis portray in the popular TV sitcom Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The father of Ross girlfriend

questions.question: What to the following files have in common: Twins Effect 2, Cradle 2 the Grave, Yakuza, Romeo Must Die?

options.text: They were all directed by the same man
They were produced by the same company
All were shot in the same country

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were all directed by the same man

questions.question: Where do most of the scenes in the Halloween II movie take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: hospital

questions.question: In what year was fictional character Michael Myers born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1957

options.text: She fell down from a considerable height.

questions.question: When does Dr. Bruce Banner transform into Hulk in one of the most expensive films in history, The Incredible Hulk (2008)?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Spielberg

questions.question: Which statement is true about John Larroquettes birth?

options.text: He was  born  11/25/1947 in New Orleans

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was  born  11/25/1947 in New Orleans

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Justin Timberlake

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and John Larroquette
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, john, fiction. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which statement is true about John Larroquette ?

options.text: He is an avid Chicago Bears fan.
He has served in the U.S. National Guard.
He has been  a  member of the National Rifle Association.
He has been a member of the Democratic Party.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He has been a member of the Democratic Party.

questions.question: What Hollywood actress starred in Steven Spielbergs 1982 movie E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial as little Gertie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drew Barrymore

questions.question: From 1984-1992 John Larroquette portrayed the Assistant District Attorny on Night Court. What was the name of his character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Fielding

questions.question: Which of the Terminator movies was voted the eighth greatest science fiction movie in history by the American Film Institute in 2008?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

questions.question: What was the original title considered by director Stanley Kubrick for his 1968 movie 2001: A Space Odyssey, the greatest science fiction movie according to the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Journey Beyond the Stars

questions.question: John Larroquette ha  appeared in both The Practice and Boston Legal as lawyer Carl Sack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which Academy Award did the 1979 science fiction movie Alien receive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best Visual Effects

questions.question: What should humans do in order to keep planet Earth safe in the 1951 science fiction movie The Day the Earth Stood Still?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Curb their aggression

questions.question: Who directed the 1985 blockbuster movie Back to the Future?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Zemeckis

questions.question: What differs the Pod People from their human counterparts in the 1956 science fiction movie Invasion of the Body Snatchers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They lack emotions.

questions.question: Who directed the 1971 science fiction movie A Clockwork Orange, which voted the fourth best science fiction movie by the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stanley Kubrick

questions.question: What Goonie character said Here he comes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mama

questions.question: From 1993-1996 John Larroquette starred in a TV comedy show about a man who runs a bus terminal in St. Louis, Missouri. What was the name of this show? It also had Chi McBride, Liz Torres,  Darryl Mitchell, Omri Katz, and  Mayik Bialik in the cast.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The John Larroquette Show

questions.question: John Larroquette has  won many acting awards. How many CONSECUTIVE Emmys did he  win ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: What actor starred in the 1982 science fiction movie Blade Runner as Rick Deckard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harrison Ford

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Butterfly Mcqueen and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, toe, mikey. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who said Huh? Sorry in the film The Goonies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brand

questions.question: In 1943, Butterfly McQueen appeared in this Vincent Minelli/ Busby Berkly directed movie with an African- American cast including Ethel Waters, Louis Armstrong, and Eddie Rochester Anderson.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cabin in the Sky

questions.question: How did actress Butterfly McQueen get the name Butterfly?

options.text: From her role in Gone With the Wind
She wanted an unusual name for show business.
From a ballet dance she performed

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From a ballet dance she performed

questions.question: In the movie The Goonies Andi says Oh, I stubbed my toe.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which statement about Butterfly McQueen is true?

options.text: She received a B.A. degree in Political Science from New York City College.
She received an Honorary Doctorate in Film from UCLA.
She received a degree in communications from Howard University.
She received an Honorary Doctorate in Film from Morehouse University.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She received a B.A. degree in Political Science from New York City College.

questions.question: Actress Butterfly McQueen never got her high school diploma.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What character from the movie The Goonies said Here, grab the rock?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brand

questions.question: What was the first movie in which Butterfly McQueen appeared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Women

questions.question: From 1950-1953, Butterfly McQueen appeared in the TV sitcom Beulah. Which Academy Award winner played the title role?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hattie McDaniels

questions.question: Who played the male leading role in Mosquito Coast, the last movie in which Butterfly McQueen starred?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harrison Ford

questions.question: Who said You got it in the movie The Goonies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andi

questions.question: Which statement regarding Butterfly McQueens death is true?

options.text: She died at the age of 94 in Los Angeles, California.
She died of pneumonia at 77 in her home in Bramwell, South Carolina.
She died at the age of 84 in Augusta, Georgia.
She died poverty stricken at the age of 74, in New York City.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She died at the age of 84 in Augusta, Georgia.

questions.question: What character from The Goonies said Scared Mikey?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brand

questions.question: When was Butterfly McQueen born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1/ 7/ 1911

questions.question: What job was Butterfly McQueens first goal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: nursing
